home.title: SaúdePilates - Pilates Studio Management System
home.description: Manage your Pilates studio efficiently. Complete software with student control, class scheduling and financial management.
home.heroDescription: Complete system for Pilates studio management. Financial control, class scheduling, student and teacher management in a single platform.
home.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage your studio
home.financialControlDesc: Manage revenue, expenses and track your studio's cash flow with detailed reports.
home.paymentManagementDesc: Control monthly fees, generate invoices and track overdue payments easily.
home.financialReportsDesc: Access detailed reports on revenue, expenses and financial projections to make strategic decisions.
home.studentRegistrationDesc: Register students, maintain evolution history and manage personalized lesson plans.
home.classScheduleDesc: Organize schedules, manage classes and control class capacity easily.
home.attendanceControlDesc: Record attendance, control frequency and manage class replacements easily.
home.systemSettingsDesc: Customize plans, prices, schedules and configure all aspects of your studio.
home.userManagementDesc: Manage teachers, students and staff with different access levels.
home.communicationDesc: Send messages, notifications and keep everyone informed about classes and payments.

guide.title: Complete Guide - SaúdePilates | How to use our platform
guide.description: Complete guide to SaúdePilates for administrators, teachers and students. Learn how to manage plans, users, payments and all features of our platform.
guide.introduction: Welcome to the complete guide to the SaúdePilates platform! Here you will find all the information you need to use our system, regardless of your role: studio administrator, teacher or student. Our platform was developed to facilitate the management of Pilates studios, optimizing processes and improving the experience for everyone involved.
guide.adminDashboardDesc: The administrator dashboard provides an overview of your studio, with important metrics such as: number of active students, teachers, monthly payments, scheduled classes and monthly revenue. All data is presented in visual format to facilitate quick understanding of studio performance.
guide.plansManagementDesc: Create and manage different plans for your studio. Define values, number of classes per week, plan duration and included benefits. Plans are the foundation of your business model and can be customized according to your studio's needs.
guide.professorsManagementDesc: Add new teachers to the system, define their specialties, schedule availability and commission percentage. You can track each teacher's performance, including number of classes taught and student evaluations.
guide.studentsManagementDesc: Register new students, link to plans, view payment history and progress. Monitor attendance and results achieved by each student, facilitating follow-up and retention.
guide.paymentRegistrationDesc: Register and track all payments made by students. The system offers detailed reports on pending, overdue and completed payments, helping with studio financial management.
guide.monthlyPaymentsDesc: View payments scheduled for the current month, with status of each payment and options to register new payments or modify existing ones. This feature facilitates monthly cash flow control.
guide.professorDashboardDesc: The professor dashboard presents relevant information such as upcoming scheduled classes, number of active students, earnings for the current month and evaluations received. This centralized view helps the professor organize their work day.
guide.studentsManagementProfDesc: View the list of students under your responsibility, class history, evolution and observations. Add notes about each student's progress and recommendations for future classes.
guide.earningsHistoryDesc: Track your earnings over time, with details by periods, students and class type. Visual reports help understand income patterns and identify growth opportunities.
guide.attendanceControlDesc: Record student attendance in classes, make notes about each session and record progress. The system allows marking attendance, justified or unjustified absences, maintaining a complete history of attendance.
guide.studentEvolutionDesc: Track each student's evolution, recording important milestones, changes in physical conditions and goals achieved. This tool is fundamental to demonstrate value and results to students.
guide.scheduleDesc: View your class schedule, with details of each time, student and class type. Manage your availability and receive notifications about schedule changes.
guide.studentDashboardDesc: The student dashboard shows information such as upcoming scheduled classes, attendance history, current plan and payment status. This personalized view helps the student stay informed about their progress and commitments.
guide.classSchedulingDesc: Schedule new classes according to the teacher's availability and your plan. View available times and make reservations simply and intuitively.
guide.classHistoryDesc: Access the complete history of classes taken, including date, teacher, class type and observations. This record allows you to track the consistency of practice over time.
guide.progressEvolutionDesc: View your progress over time, with evolution milestones recorded by the teacher. Track goals achieved and next challenges.
guide.paymentsDesc: Check the status of your payments, history and upcoming due dates. The system offers total transparency about the student's financial situation with the studio.
guide.conclusionText: The SaúdePilates platform was developed to provide a complete and integrated experience for everyone involved in the teaching and practice of Pilates. By connecting administrators, teachers and students in a single system, we facilitate communication, follow-up and management, allowing everyone to focus on what really matters: results and well-being.
guide.conclusionContact: If you have additional questions about how to use any platform feature, contact our support through the

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.healthData: Health data relevant to Pilates practice
privacy.sendCommunications: Send important communications about your account
privacy.dataProtectionText: We implement security measures to protect your personal information, including:
privacy.dataSharingText: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except when:
privacy.withdrawConsent: Withdraw your consent at any time
privacy.contactText: For privacy-related questions, contact us via email: {email}
privacy.policyUpdatesText: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We recommend that you review this page regularly to stay informed about how we protect your information.
